### \proof

\begin{proof}
{Foo}
\end{proof}
\begin{proof}{Proof of Theorem 1}
Foo
\end{proof}
    
---

\begin{proof}
{<s>Sbb</s>}
\end{proof}
\begin{proof}{<s>Cebbs bs Gurberz 1</s>}
<s>Sbb</s>
\end{proof}

### \newtheorem

\newtheorem{mytheorem}[section]{Theorem}
\newtheorem{mycorollary}{Corollary}[mytheorem]
\newtheorem*{myproposition*}{Proposition}
\begin{mytheorem}
Foo
\end{mytheorem}
\begin{mycorollary}[My theorem]
Foo
\end{mycorollary}
    
---

\newtheorem{mytheorem}[section]{<s>Gurberz</s>}
\newtheorem{mycorollary}{<s>Pbebyynel</s>}[mytheorem]
\newtheorem*{myproposition*}{<s>Cebcbfvgvba</s>}
\begin{mytheorem}
<s>Sbb</s>
\end{mytheorem}
\begin{mycorollary}[<s>Zl gurberz</s>]
<s>Sbb</s>
\end{mycorollary}
